insert into oskari_user_maplayer ( user_id, parentId, type, base_map, groupId,
name, url, locale,
opacity, style, minscale, maxscale,
legend_image, metadataId,
tile_matrix_set_id, params, options,
gfi_xslt, gfi_type, gfi_content,
realtime, refresh_rate,
created, updated,
download_service_url, copyright_info) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE oskari_user_maplayer SET user_id = ?, parentId = ?, base_map = ?, groupId = ?,
name = ?, url = ?, locale = ?,
opacity = ?, style = ?, minscale = ?, maxscale = ?,
legend_image = ?, metadataId = ?,
